mapper.sql: select * from( select A.ID ,A.RGSTR_ID ,A.RGST_DT ,A.UPDTR_ID ,A.UPDT_DT ,A.APPLY_ID ,A.EDU_DIV ,A.EDU_ITEM ,(SELECT EDU_NM FROM TB_ED_EDUCATION_INFO WHERE ID = A.EDU_ITEM) AS EDU_NM ,A.CUST_NM ,A.OFFICE_NM ,A.REPR_NM ,A.OFFICE_TEL ,A.TEL_NO ,A.EMAIL ,A.OFFICE_PW ,A.INFO_YN ,TO_CHAR(B.EDU_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AS EDU_DT from TB_ED_EDUCATION_MASTER A left outer join TB_ED_EDUCATION_INFO B ON B.EDU_DIV = A.EDU_DIV AND B.ID = A.EDU_ITEM ) X
